Frequently Asked Questions

Answering your questions

What does Think Halcyon mean?

I get this question a lot actually. Firstly, the word halcyon means "reign of peace." My clients often come to me after they've tried to setup a website on their own with no luck. They're frustrated and need help. I want to support my clients as they return to a calmer and more peaceful outlook on running their business. I want them to think about peaceful and prosperous times.

What are your rates?

Each project will have a different quote depending on the type of work being done, your materials, and your budget. Squarespace websites start at $300 and custom websites start at $500. For a more detailed breakdown, let's chat in a free consultation.

I work with all budget sizes.

What kinds of payments do you accept?

I accept accept Visa, MasterCard, Maestro, American Express, JCB, Discover, Diners Club, Union Pay, Google Pay, and Apple Pay. I primarily take payments through Stripe.

Can I hire you to maintain my website for me?

Of course you can! If I have created a website for you and you simply don't have the time to update all the pages and add new content on the regular, then I'd be happy to take that over for you. Simply ask me about my monthly website maintenance service.

Can you make me a WordPress, Wix, or GoDaddy website?

Unfortunately, no. I work solely with Squarespace and custom websites hosted on platforms like Netlify and Hostinger.

As a Squarespace Circle Member, I can offer you 20% off of your first annual subscription fee when you sign up.

What should I do if I don't have good photos?

Not everyone has the time or money to hire a professional photographer to take photos of them or their businesses. If that's the case, we can use high-quality, free stock images from websites like Unsplash or Pexels, until you can get photos of your own.

Please note: It is always better to use your own photos.
